titles: A viewe of a seditious bul sent into Englande, from Pius Quintus Bishop of Rome, anno. 1569. Taken by the reuerende Father in God, Iohn Iewel, late Bishop of Salisburie. Wherevnto is added a short treatise of the holy Scriptures. Both which he deliuered in diuers sermons in his cathedral church of Salisburie, anno. 1570
author: Jewel, John, 1522-1571.
Garbrand, John, 1542-1589.
publisher: Printed by R. Newberie & H. Bynneman,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Catholic Church. --  Pope (1566-1572 : Pius V). --  Regnans in excelsis --  Controversial literature.
